citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:50 PM on 08-
DEC-2022. Inspector arrived at 2:50 PM and called licensee. Licensee stated he was unavailable until 6 pm and there is
no authorized contact available to perform a facility inspection.
End Section

narrative:

no authorized contact available to perform a facility inspection.
